{"id":918468657,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1679283025,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/918468657/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Knight Tour Configuration","memory":"42 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int[][] ways={{2,1},{-2,1},{2,-1},{-2,-1},{1,2},{1,-2},{-1,2},{-1,-2}};\n    public boolean checkValidGrid(int[][] grid){\n        boolean[][] vis= new boolean[grid.length][grid[0].length];\n        \n        if(grid[0][0]!=0){\n            return false;\n        }\n        return dfs(grid,0,0,0,vis);\n        \n    }\n    public boolean dfs(int[][] grid,int i,int j,int curr,boolean[][] vis){\n        vis[i][j]=true;\n        if(curr==(grid.length)*(grid.length)-1){\n            return true;\n        }\n        int x=-1;\n        int y=-1;\n        for(int m=0;m<8;m++){\n            int currx=ways[m][0]+i;\n            int curry=ways[m][1]+j;\n            if(isvalid(currx,curry,grid.length) && !vis[currx][curry] && grid[currx][curry]==curr+1){\n                x=currx;\n                y=curry;\n            }\n        }\n        if(x==-1 && y==-1){\n            return false;\n        }\n        else{\n            return dfs(grid,x,y,curr+1,vis);\n        }\n\n        \n    }\n    public boolean isvalid(int x ,int y,int n){\n        if(x<0 || x>n-1 || y<0 || y>n-1){\n            return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-knight-tour-configuration","has_notes":false}
